rt.intersectables
Class Mesh

java.lang.Object
  rt.intersectables.Aggregate
      rt.intersectables.Mesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
public class Mesh
extends Aggregate

A triangle mesh. The mesh internally stores the triangles using vertex and index arrays. The mesh also instantiates a MeshTriangle for each triangle, and the mesh provides an iterator to iterate through the triangles.

          Index array.

Field Detail

vertices

public float[] vertices
Array of triangle vertices. Stores x,y,z coordinates for each vertex consecutively.

normals

public float[] normals
Array of triangle normals (one normal per vertex). Stores x,y,z coordinates for each normal consecutively.

indices

public int[] indices
Index array. Each triangle is defined by three consecutive indices in this array. The indices refer to the vertices and normals arrays that store vertex and normal coordinates.

material

public Material material
A material.
